youtube.title: How the First Menstrual Period Works | Biology Animation
youtube.description: Learn the biological process of the first menstrual period in this clear 3D animation. We explain the changes in the uterine lining and the hormonal shifts that trigger your first cycle. Perfect for students and anyone curious about reproductive health.
